house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1971 has 4 bedroom(s), 2 full bath(s)/1 half bath(s) , 2 car garage. Rooms include dining room, family room, master bedroom. Features include private pool, patio, air conditioning, storage space.

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Dining Room, Family Room, Master Bedroom

house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Ceiling Fan(s), Dishwasher, Garage Door Opener, Guest Room, Pantry,Storage Space, Workshop
